channel.description: Recent content in Themes on vrrdnt

item.title: Hugo Table of Contents showcase
item.description: This post shows the default Hugo Table of Contents and how not-much handle it.

item.title: Hugo shortcodes
item.description: This post shows the default Hugo shortcodes and how they are rendered.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
